name: Overnight (itch)
description:
Overview

Overnight is a story driven horror game based on the psychological effects of PTSD. Overnight tells the story of a war veteran working as a park ranger. A simple day job takes a ominous turn when a vengeful killer gets on the loose. 

Your goal is to find clues and track down a killer in the park. However, be warned: your PTSD haunts you. Find a way to escape it and stay on the murderer's trail.

Controls Keyboard/Mouse
  • WASD:  move player
  • Mouse:  look around
  • Left Click:  Interact with objects
  • F:  Flashlight
